data.title: Benton Township High School District 126
data.meta_description: Home - Zion-Benton Township High School District 126
data.text:
Welcome!

Communication and connection with our school families, faculty, and local community are our top priorities.

We are thrilled to introduce newly designed and reconfigured websites for all our schools and the district. Please bear with us as we update, revise, and add valuable information for our visitors.

This project will continue throughout the summer, and we aim to have everything fully operational by the new school year.

Thank you for your patience and support!
